entry.question: What does it mean that “my deck can have up to 1 extra STAR of cards?” Does that mean characters or battle cards?
entry.answer: Your Battle deck may include 1 Star card and still be considered a Legal Deck. Examples include Mounted Missiles, Energized Field, Leap of Faith, etc.

entry.question: Do these abilities apply to both modes for Barricade?
entry.answer: Yes, Alt and Bot Mode will gain the benefit of Tough 1.

entry.question: This is legal to play in Junkion, but what common star cards even are there to play?
entry.answer: There are now 3 Star cards at the Common rarity for Junkion with the addition of ATP-2: Hands-Free Artillery, Bullseye Aegis, and Spotlights. Aerial Defense Armaments 1. Does Aerial Defense Armaments still get its trigger if I don’t have Superion in play? The move 1 damage will trigger for placing it on an Aerialbot, you will not repair 1 damage, though.

entry.question: What types of battle Icons are those?
entry.answer: They are faction stamped icons for Aerialbots, therefore only when an Aerialbot is battling can you gain benefit from the Blue or White icon(s). It will still count as both colors for abilities that check if you flip a certain type or number of colors.
